name: proximity-events-webhook-parser
description: An unofficial AWS Lambda/API Gateway function for parsing and queuing webhook events sent by the Proximity Events iPhone app.
author: Tim Malone <tdmalone@gmail.com>

scripts.test: yarn test-visit-exit && yarn test-form-data && yarn test-location-update
scripts._test: docker run --name lambda --rm -e CI -e SNS_QUEUE -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -v "${PWD}":/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler
